sn12.46:1.2: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn12.46:1.3: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12.46:2.1: “Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, so karoti so paṭisaṁvedayatī”ti?
sn12.46:2.2: “‘So karoti so paṭisaṁvedayatī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayameko anto”.
sn12.46:3.1: “Kiṁ pana, bho gotama, añño karoti, añño paṭisaṁvedayatī”ti?
sn12.46:3.2: “‘Añño karoti, añño paṭisaṁvedayatī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayaṁ dutiyo anto.
sn12.46:3.3: Ete te, brāhmaṇa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti:
sn12.46:4.1: Evaṁ vutte, so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12.46:4.3: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
